attributes.action: prosecution for parents who allow Female genital mutilation in this country
attributes.additional_details: NSPCC estimate 137,000 cases in uk who knows how many more we need the law to be upheld there is no basis for this abuse in religion
attributes.background: I feel that despite being of a different culture,people living in the UK should be made to  follow English Law, it is prejudice if only a certain part of society has laws to conform to , 1,200 cases have been reported in the last 3 months, .Child abuse is being, allowed
